|cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 74Kc |cpu1_type_rev = |cpu1spd = 775 |cpu2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA7500; |cpu2_cores = |cpu2_type = |cpu2_type_rev = |cpu2spd = |is_doc = ? |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Winbond;; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = |flash2type = |fla2_num = |fla2chip = Winbond;; |flash2size = 4 |flash2maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Winbond;; |ram1_num = |ram2type = |ram2type1 = |ram2size = 64 |ram2chip = Winbond;; |ram2_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8337N; |lan_ports = 3 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = |oui = |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 0.2 |pwr_conn = CEE 7/17 |serial = |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = HomePlug AV2, MIMO |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |defaulip = http://ap.asus.com |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = PL-AC56_XX_2G, PL-AC56_XX_5G |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 08/2016 |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B01IR41S4C |asin_country = GB |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9882; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 866 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *Web Management: http://ap.asus.com Sold as part of the ''PL-AC56 Kit'' which also includes a [[ASUS PL-E56P]] :''1200Mbps HomePlug AV2 AC1200 Wi-Fi Powerline Adapter Kit'' This device is not certified by the FCC and is not sold in the US. {{See also|TP-LINK TL-WPA8630}} ==Links of Interest== *[https://forum.openwrt.org/t/support-for-asus-pl-ac56-qca956x-soc-qca9558-plc-chip/15338 ''Support for ASUS PL-AC56'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums] *[https://forum.openwrt.org/t/asus-pl-ac56-serial-console/115807 ''ASUS PL-AC56 Serial Console'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums] ===Reviews=== *[http://www.digitalcitizen.life/asus-pl-ac56-review-powerline-adapter-kit-hits-brick On '''Digital Citizen'''] *[https://youtu.be/XmVyLiTHVr4?t=1m15s ''Video showing the label'' on '''YouTube'''] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|development}} {{OpenWrtNotice|prebuilt}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/asus/asus_pl-ac56 |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ath79 |subtarget = generic |arch = mips_24kc |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = 23.05.0 |image_too_big = |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ==Notes== ===Firmware=== *[https://github.com/RMerl/asuswrt-merlin/blob/master/release/src/router/shared/model.c On '''RMerlin'''] (GitHub) {{SCollapse2|RTCONFIG_QCA |
#elif defined (RTCONFIG_QCA)
	{ "PL-N11",	MODEL_PLN11	},
	{ "PL-N12",	MODEL_PLN12	},
	{ "PL-AC56",	MODEL_PLAC56	},
	{ "PL-AC66U",	MODEL_PLAC66U	},
	{ "4G-AC55U",	MODEL_RT4GAC55U	},
	{ "RT-AC55U",	MODEL_RTAC55U	},
	{ "RT-AC55UHP",	MODEL_RTAC55UHP	},
	{ "RT-AC58U",	MODEL_RTAC58U	},
	{ "RT-AC82U",	MODEL_RTAC82U	},
	{ "RT-AC88N",	MODEL_RTAC88N	},
	{ "RT-AC88S",	MODEL_RTAC88S	},
	{ "BRT-AC828",  MODEL_BRTAC828  },

#ifdef RTCONFIG_QCA
  #if defined (RTCONFIG_WIFI_QCA9557_QCA9882)
#elif defined (RTCONFIG_WIFI_QCA9990_QCA9990) 
   || defined (RTCONFIG_WIFI_QCA9994_QCA9994) 
  #if defined (RTCONFIG_SOC_IPQ8064) 
   || defined (RTCONFIG_SOC_IPQ40XX)

#if defined (RTCONFIG_SWITCH_RTL8370M_PHY_QCA8033_X2) 
 || defined (RTCONFIG_SWITCH_RTL8370MB_PHY_QCA8033_X2)
mknod ("/dev/rtkswitch", S_IFCHR | 0666, makedev(206, 0));

#if (defined (PLN11) || defined (PLN12) 
  || defined (PLAC56) || defined (PLAC66U))
 eval ("ln", "-sf", "/dev/mtdblock2", "/dev/caldata");
 /* mtdblock2 = SPI flash, Factory MTD partition */
#elif (defined (RTAC58U) || defined (RTAC82U))
 eval ("ln", "-sf", "/dev/mtdblock3", "/dev/caldata");
 /* mtdblock3 = cal in NAND flash, Factory MTD partition */

 /* QCA8337_MODEL_LIST = "PL-AC56 PL-AC66U 
    RT-AC55U RT-AC55UHP 4G-AC55U" */
 /* QCA9531ESW_MODEL_LIST = "PL-N11 PL-N12" */
 /* RTL8370M_MODEL_LIST = "RT-AC88S RT-AC88Q BRT-AC828" */
 /* IPQ40XX_DAKOTA_MODEL_LIST = "RT-AC58U RT-AC82U" */
 /* DUMMY_SWITCH_MODEL_LIST = "RT-AC88N" */
 /* MT7620ESW_MODEL_LIST = "RT-N11P RT-N300 RT-N14U 
    RT-AC51U RT-AC52U RT-AC1200HP" */
 /* MT7621ESW_MODEL_LIST = "RT-N56UB1 RT-N56UB2" */

 'Maliby' series: IPQ4018, RE.DK05.1, QCA7500, RE.CH T01.1 SR, SKA BU
 IPQ4018, AP.DKO1.1, DAKOTA 1.0, MALIBU 1.1, 2X2 11AC, DBDC, FEM

 See also https://www.qualcomm.com/products/ipq4018 
 and https://www.qualcomm.com/products/qca7500
}} {{SCollapse2|cpu info |
admin@PL-AC56:/tmp/home/root# cat /proc/cpuinfo

system type             : Qualcomm Atheros QCA956X rev 0
machine                 : Qualcomm Atheros AP152 reference board
processor               : 0
cpu model               : MIPS 74Kc V5.0
BogoMIPS                : 385.84
wait instruction        : yes
microsecond timers      : yes
tlb_entries             : 32
extra interrupt vector  : yes
hardware watchpoint     : yes, count: 4, address/irw mask: 
                          [0x0000, 0x0b08, 0x0da8, 0x0170]
ASEs implemented        : mips16 dsp
shadow register sets    : 1
kscratch registers      : 0
core                    : 0
VCED exceptions         : not available
VCEI exceptions         : not available

 cat /proc/athversion

10.2.4-2.9.0.009 (QCA9558.ILQ.2.0 CSU1.2)
}} ==See also== ====[[:Category:Powerline|PowerLine]] ([[QCA]])==== *[[ASUS PL-AC66U]] - AC1750 (QCA8337, SPI) *ASUS PL-AC56 - AC1200 (QCA7500/QCA8337, SPI) • AP152 *[[ASUS PL-E56P]] - AV1200 (QCA7500/AR8035) *[[ASUS PL-E52P]] - AV600 (QCA7450/AR1540/AR8035) *[[ASUS PL-E41]] - AV500 (AR7420/AR1540) *[[ASUS PL-N12]] - N300 (QCA9531, SPI) *[[ASUS PL-N11]] - N300 (QCA9531, SPI) *[[ASUS PL-X51P]] *[[ASUS PL-X31M]] *[[ASUS PL-X31]] ;Range Extenders *[[ASUS RP-AC51]] - AC750 *[[ASUS RP-AC52]] - AC750 ([[MediaTek]] MT7620A/MT7610EN) *[[ASUS RP-AC53]] - AC750 ([[Realtek]] RTL8881AN/RTL8192ER) *[[ASUS RP-AC55]] - AC1200 ([[Realtek]] RTL8197FS/RTL8812BRH) *[[ASUS RP-AC56]] - AC1200 ([[MediaTek]] MT7621S/MT7603EN/MT7612EN) *[[ASUS RP-AC66]] - AC1750 ([[QCA]] QCA956X/QCA8033) • [https://github.com/drag0njoe/RT-AC55U/blob/master/release/src-rt/target.mak GitHub] *[[ASUS RP-AC68U]] - AC1900 ([[Realtek]] RTL8198C/RTL8194AR/RTL8814AR) *[[ASUS RP-AC87]] - AC2600 ([[MediaTek]] MT7621AT/2x MT7615E) ====Wireless Routers ([[QCA]])==== *[[ASUS 4G-AC53U]] - AC1300 (IPQ4018, NAND) • Dakota *[[ASUS 4G-AC55U]] - AC1200 (QCA9558/QCA9882/QCA8337) • AP135 *[[ASUS RT-AC55U]] - AC1200 (QCA9557/QCA9882/QCA8337) • AP135 *[[ASUS RT-AC55UHP]] - AC1200 (QCA9557/QCA9882/QCA8337) • AP135 *[[ASUS RT-AC58U]] - AC1300 (IPQ4018, NAND) • Dakota *[[ASUS RT-AC82U]] - AC2100 (IPQ4019, NAND) • Dakota *[[ASUS RT-AC88N]] - (IPQ8064/[[QCA]] Cascade/QCA8337N) • [https://github.com/drag0njoe/RT-AC55U/blob/master/release/src-rt/target.mak GitHub] *[[ASUS RT-AC88S]] - (IPQ8064/[[QCA]] Cascade/RTL8370MB/QCA8033 x2) *[[ASUS RT-AC88Q]] - (IPQ8064/RTL8370M) *[[ASUS BRT-AC828/M2]] - AC2600 (IPQ8065/2x QCA9984/RTL8370M) *[[ASUS BRT-AC414]] - (IPQ8065/RTL8370) [[Category:English Documentation]]
